mapper.select: select * from MBR_INFO where MBR_ID = #{MBR_ID} and MBR_STTUS = 0
select MBR_NCNM from MBR_INFO where MBR_NCNM = #{MBR_NCNM}
select MBR_EML_ADDR from MBR_INFO where MBR_EML_ADDR = #{MBR_EML_ADDR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MBR_INFO (MBR_ID, MBR_EML_ADDR, MBR_NCNM, MBR_PWD, MBR_TY) VALUES (#{MBR_ID}, #{MBR_EML_ADDR}, #{MBR_NCNM}, #{MBR_PWD}, 'ROLE_MEMBER')
mapper.update: update MBR_INFO set MBR_NCNM = #{MBR_NCNM}, MBR_AGE = #{MBR_AGE}, MBR_GENDER = #{MBR_GENDER},MBR_PREFER_AREA = #{MBR_PREFER_AREA}, MBR_ACT_REALM = #{MBR_ACT_REALM}, MBR_PREFER_GENRE = #{MBR_PREFER_GENRE}, MBR_INTRO = #{MBR_INTRO}, MDF_DT = now() where MBR_ID = #{MBR_ID}
mapper.select: select CTGRY_NM,CTGRY_ID from BAND_CTGRY where CTGRY_TY = #{type}
